accelerometer_deployment.py
Go to the documentation of this file.
1 from robotic_skin.sensor.lsm6ds3_accel import LSM6DS3_acclerometer
2 from sensor_msgs.msg import Imu
3 import rospy
4 import argparse
5 import rospkg
6 
7 if __name__ == "__main__":
8  parser = argparse.ArgumentParser()
9  parser.add_argument('--accel1_config_file', action="store",
10  dest="accel1_config_file", required=True,
11  help="The configuration yaml file name of acceleromter 1 in package's config folder")
12  parser.add_argument('--accel2_config_file', action="store",
13  dest="accel2_config_file", required=True,
14  help="The configuration yaml file name of acceleromter 2 in package's config folder")
15  args = parser.parse_args()
16  ros_robotic_skin_path = rospkg.RosPack().get_path('ros_robotic_skin')
17  config_file_accel1 = "%s/config/%s" % (ros_robotic_skin_path, args.accel1_config_file)
18  config_file_accel2 = "%s/config/%s" % (ros_robotic_skin_path, args.accel2_config_file)
19  accel_0 = LSM6DS3_acclerometer(config_file_accel1)
20  accel_1 = LSM6DS3_acclerometer(config_file_accel2)
21  ros_node_name = 'talker_%s_%s' % (str(accel_0.config_dict['imu_number']), str(accel_1.config_dict['imu_number']))
22  rospy.init_node(ros_node_name, anonymous=True)
23  pub0 = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data%s' % str(accel_0.config_dict['imu_number']), Imu, queue_size=10)
24  pub1 = rospy.Publisher('/imu_data%s' % str(accel_1.config_dict['imu_number']), Imu, queue_size=10)
25  r = rospy.Rate(100)
26  imu_msg0 = Imu()
27  imu_msg1 = Imu()
28  while not rospy.is_shutdown():
29  data0_list = accel_0.read()
30  data1_list = accel_1.read()
31  imu_msg0.linear_acceleration.x = data0_list[0]
32  imu_msg0.linear_acceleration.y = data0_list[1]
33  imu_msg0.linear_acceleration.z = data0_list[2]
34  pub0.publish(imu_msg0)
35  imu_msg1.linear_acceleration.x = data1_list[0]
36  imu_msg1.linear_acceleration.y = data1_list[1]
37  imu_msg1.linear_acceleration.z = data1_list[2]
38  pub1.publish(imu_msg0)
39  r.sleep()
